page.title: 15Clubs.
page.content: There are many clubs in Riding Mill. I go to Cubs. You have to wear a uniform which is a green jumper, some grey trousers and a red neckerchief. We play many games in side and out. Every year we make a little fire to cook sausages and we have a drink as well. I go to Gym club.You have to do movements on the bar and also on the box, the mats and the trampoline. When you manage to achieve some thing then you get a tick. When you get ten ticks then you get a badge. I go to choir. We practise some hymns for the next Sunday so that when we go to church we improve the singing. I go to "Watch" which is a nature study club. Some times we go out and look at the thing we are talking about that week other times we just take notes of what we are talking about.
